[[Gaara]] creates an eye out of [[sand]] that hovers in the air wherever it's created. Gaara connects the eye with his [[wikipedia:optic nerve|optic nerve]] using [[chakra]], allowing him to see whatever is in the Third Eye's field of vision. The eye gives Gaara a useful method of performing surveillance without being noticed;<ref name="d1"/> in ''[[Sakura Hiden]]'', Gaara manipulates the Third Eye's sand to allow it to double as a [[wikipedia:listening device|listening device]]. Gaara also uses the Third Eye when fully surrounding himself with the [[Shield of Sand]], allowing him to be protected without sacrificing seeing what opponents are doing.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 113</ref> In ''[[Gaara Hiden]]'', Gaara is capable of creating several Third Eyes and connect each eye to his optical nerve at once, allowing him to observe things from multiple angles simultaneously.

[[Rasa]] [[Magnet Release|makes]] his Third Eye out of [[Gold Dust]]. Rasa, like Gaara, must close one of his eyes before he can see through the Third Eye.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 547, page 7</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 556, page 8</ref> In the anime, Shinki has displayed the ability of creating multiple Third Eyes with his [[Iron Sand]], without the need of closing one of his, though it quickly drains his chakra.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 124</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In Buddhism and Hinduism, the [[Wikipedia:Third eye|third eye]] is considered to be the eye of knowledge and symbolises enlightenment, some deities being depicted with it.
* In [[The Hidden Plot Set Into Motion|''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 410]], the eye is depicted as blue, matching Gaara's eye colour.
